search_results.snippet: AI agents are advanced AI systems designed to autonomously reason, plan, and execute complex tasks based on high-level goals.

search_results.snippet: AI agents are software systems that use AI to pursue goals and complete tasks on behalf of users. They show reasoning, planning, and memory.

search_results.snippet: AI agents are a type of artificial intelligence (AI) system that can understand and respond to customer inquiries without human intervention.
